name: To The Top (itch) (Pixel Goat Studios)
description:
*This is my first game so please tell me what you think about it if you play it.

To The Top...

is a short but challenging platformer where the goal is to reach the top of the level, that is all there is to the game, can you do it?

The game contains 4 kinds of enemies, spikes, blocks, and some checkpoints to make the game a tad bit easier.

The controls are the arrow-keys and you use the mouse to press buttons.
